mapper.insert: insert into review(clubno, userid, username, hit, subject, content, ip, people, link, visitdate, location, revisit, score) values( ${clubno}, #{userid}, #{username}, ${hit}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{ip}, ${people}, #{link}, #{visitdate}, #{location}, #{revisit}, ${score})
mapper.select: select no,userid, username, content, date_format(writedate,'%Y-%m-%d') writedate, people, hit, subject, date_format(visitdate,'%Y-%m-%d') visitdate, location, revisit, score ,link from review where clubno=${param1}

select no, clubno, userid, username, content, date_format(writedate,'%Y-%m-%d') writedate, hit, subject, people, date_format(visitdate,'%Y-%m-%d') visitdate, location, revisit, score ,link from review where no=${param1} and clubno=${param2}
mapper.update: update review set subject=#{subject}, content=#{content} ,people=${people}, link=#{link}, visitdate=#{visitdate}, location=#{location}, revisit=#{revisit},score=${score} where no=${no} and userid=#{userid}
